name: Heart Drilling
desc: When battle starts, all enemies take random DoT lasting for 3 rounds. DoT (Bleeding & Poisoning & Burning) taken by the enemies increases by 25%.

name: Dual Blade
desc: Allies' Basic Attack damage increases by 100%. Whenever an ally performs a Basic Attack, there is 50% chance to perform an additional Basic Attack.

name: Potency Evocation
desc: Increases Crit by 25%, Crit Damage by 25% to all your girls.

name: Way of Shura
desc: When a girl takes damage, she has 75% chance to counterattack, dealing (100% of Attack) Damage, must hit.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Increases your girls' Maximum Hp by 20%

name: Cloudy Storm
desc: Allies' HP healing amount will  be increased by 25%. All enemies' HP healing amount will be decreased by 75%. Whenever a girl is healed, the enemy with the highest HP will take damage(5% of the Max HP of the girl who was healed) (no more than 80000), must hit.

name: Unified Body
desc: Your girls gain 25% Damage Reduce Rate. Whenever a girl takes damage, it will have 50% chance to distribute evenly among all allies.

name: Immunity
desc: Increases your girls' Control Immune by 40%

name: Shields Up
desc: Increases your girls' Block rate by 30%

name: Dreadnought
desc: Increases the Armor of Girls in Front-line by 25%, and allows them to receive 200% Healing amount when healed

name: Multicast
desc: Your girls has a 25% chance to trigger their Active Skills again

name: Evil Ritual
desc: When battle starts, your girls have 90% HP and 200 Energy.

name: Blood Thirst
desc: Heals your Girls for 15% of attack damage they dealt

name: Sanctuary
desc: Allows your girls to immune from a lethal damage (can stack with the same type of effect girls get from antiques)
